pages.text: Monster ingredients are usually dropped from mobs.$(br)If two or more monster ingredients are used in the pot, the crock pot produces $(item)Monster Lasagna$() unless $(item)Stick$() or $(item)Bamboo$() are added (which makes $(item)Wet Goop$()) or higher priority food is available. As such, only one monster ingredient should ever be attempted as $(thing)filler$() for a dish.
